pages.text: These dogs were originally bred to be farm dogs used for herding, guarding, and acting as family companions.$(br2)Standing at roughly half a block tall, these small dogs are surprisingly sturdy and come in four different coats.
These dogs are commonly found in some forests and taigas. They can also be found in old growth taiga biomes, and more rarely in dark forests.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef Treat.
